<item>
  <title>Genes that encourage same-sex mating in beetles help opposite gender reproduce</title>
  <link>http://www.independent.co.uk/news/science/beetles-genes-same-sex-sexual-behaviour-mating-reproduction-uppsala-university-a7026851.html</link>
  <description><![CDATA['The genetic mechanism explaining the occurrence of same-sex sexual behaviour that we demonstrate in these beetles could apply equally well in very different animals']]></description>
  <pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 00:06:42 +0000</pubDate>
  <guid>a7026851</guid>
  <author>Ian Johnston</author>
  <dc:creator>Ian Johnston</dc:creator>
  <dc:date>2016-05-13T00:06:42+00:00</dc:date>
  <media:thumbnail url="http://static.independent.co.uk/s3fs-public/styles/feed/public/thumbnails/image/2016/05/12/18/cropbeetlesex.jpg" type="image/jpeg"/>
  <media:content url="http://static.independent.co.uk/s3fs-public/thumbnails/image/2016/05/12/18/cropbeetlesex.jpg" type="image/jpeg"/>
  <media:text>These are two male seed beetles. The male to the left is trying to insert his genitalia into the other male after having mounted him. This usually results in the mounted male kicking with his hind legs in an attempt to escape.  (Picture: [copyright])</media:text>
</item>
<item>
  <title>Psychopathy may be a result of &apos;adaptive evolution&apos; rather than a disorder, says inventor of the psychopath test</title>
  <link>http://www.independent.co.uk/news/science/psychopathy-may-be-a-result-of-adaptive-evolution-rather-than-a-disorder-says-inventor-of-the-a7025706.html</link>
  <description><![CDATA[Are the psychopaths among us part of a unique evolutionary strand?]]></description>
  <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 17:25:43 +0000</pubDate>
  <guid>a7025706</guid>
  <author>Harry Cockburn</author>
  <dc:creator>Harry Cockburn</dc:creator>
  <dc:date>2016-05-12T17:25:43+00:00</dc:date>
  <media:thumbnail url="http://static.independent.co.uk/s3fs-public/styles/feed/public/thumbnails/image/2016/05/12/11/brain_magnifying_glass.jpg" type="image/jpeg"/>
  <media:content url="http://static.independent.co.uk/s3fs-public/thumbnails/image/2016/05/12/11/brain_magnifying_glass.jpg" type="image/jpeg"/>
  <media:text>Examining the mind  (Picture: [copyright])</media:text>
</item>
<item>
  <title>Cancer scientists find way to halt spread of the disease by making cells &apos;literally get stuck&apos;</title>
  <link>http://www.independent.co.uk/news/science/cancer-cells-metastasis-professor-kay-macleod-chicago-university-prevent-moving-a7026446.html</link>
  <description><![CDATA['Through the microscope, you can see the cell wobbling, trying to move, to put out new protrusions, to migrate, but it can't']]></description>
  <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 16:02:00 +0000</pubDate>
  <guid>a7026446</guid>
  <author>Ian Johnston</author>
  <dc:creator>Ian Johnston</dc:creator>
  <dc:date>2016-05-12T16:02:00+00:00</dc:date>
  <media:thumbnail url="http://static.independent.co.uk/s3fs-public/styles/feed/public/thumbnails/image/2016/01/10/22/Cancer-Rex.jpg" type="image/jpeg"/>
  <media:content url="http://static.independent.co.uk/s3fs-public/thumbnails/image/2016/01/10/22/Cancer-Rex.jpg" type="image/jpeg"/>
  <media:text>The charity Macmillan Cancer Support has said that from 2017 those who are judged as too ill to work, but who may be capable of work at some time in the future, will lose £30 a week  (Picture: [copyright])</media:text>
</item>
<item>
  <title>Popular painkiller ingredient can reduce empathy, study finds</title>
  <link>http://www.independent.co.uk/news/science/popular-painkiller-ingredient-acetaminophen-can-reduce-empathy-study-finds-a7026061.html</link>
  <description><![CDATA['We don't know why acetaminophen is having these effects, but it is concerning']]></description>
  <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 13:20:35 +0000</pubDate>
  <guid>a7026061</guid>
  <author>Amy Ellis Nutt</author>
  <dc:creator>Amy Ellis Nutt</dc:creator>
  <dc:date>2016-05-12T13:20:35+00:00</dc:date>
  <media:thumbnail url="http://static.independent.co.uk/s3fs-public/styles/feed/public/thumbnails/image/2016/01/26/14/vicodin.jpg" type="image/jpeg"/>
  <media:content url="http://static.independent.co.uk/s3fs-public/thumbnails/image/2016/01/26/14/vicodin.jpg" type="image/jpeg"/>
  <media:text>The prescription pain killer Vicodin has been linked to a number of deaths  (Picture: [copyright])</media:text>
</item>
